title: WTB: T200 Fatima Team Cards VG-Ex or better
author: wondo

posts.post_title: WTB: T200 Fatima Team Cards VG-Ex or better
posts.post_content:
I am looking to improve my T200 Fatima team set and am looking for better graded specimens (PSA 4 / SGC 50 and above) for my collection - paying strongly and I will buy duplicates.  Please PM or email [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url] with specifics.  Thank you.

John Wondowski
Drop the grade range a bit
